/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a moment on a road in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's view of the surroundings. The road itself is divided by a green fence, adding a pop of color to the scene. On either side of the road, there are trees standing tall, their leaves a mix of green hues. Power lines stretch across the sky, following the path of the road. In the distance, buildings can be seen, their silhouettes faint against the overcast sky. The image is taken from a low angle, making the viewer feel as if they are part of the scene.
